$WmMPID_水着ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Swim18,Face|Ready, Noire? You can stay calm,
just like we practiced. Deep breaths.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ノワール,ch04_26_Noir_F_Swim18,Face|I'm ready...I think. I'm not sure! Just in
case, let me apologize in advance for
getting in your way...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Swim18,Face|Nonsense. Your skill will see you
through this. I can see it in your eyes!$k$pHmm...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ノワール,ch04_26_Noir_F_Swim18,Face|Uh... Why are you staring? Is there
something wrong with my swimsuit?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Swim18,Face|No, no... It's nothing. Whatsoever.
Let's...get going!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ノワール,ch04_26_Noir_F_Swim18,Face|IMPUDENT FOOLS! How dare you!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Swim18,Face|Noire, remember what I said... Deep
breaths...$k$pLet us retreat for now. We'll have
another chance at this.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ノワール,ch04_26_Noir_F_Swim18,Face|You're right... Thank you, Cordelia.$k$p$Sbs150|
